backend/api/email.py.description: Email infrastructure with send_email() and send_email_async() functions. Uses EmailLog model for tracking, Celery for async delivery, and templates from backend/templates/email/

backend/api/views_alerts.py.description: AlertListView already checks for account_locked action in audit logs. Existing pattern for admin alerting that aggregates from multiple sources (audit, system, webhooks)

backend/config/settings/base.py.description: django-axes configured with AXES_FAILURE_LIMIT=5, AXES_COOLOFF_TIME=1 hour, AxesStandaloneBackend for auth, AXES_ENABLE_ACCESS_FAILURE_LOG=True

backend/api/lockout_tracking.py.description: Redis-based lockout tracking utilities using sorted sets for time-windowed event counting. Provides increment_lockout_count(), get_lockout_count(), get_affected_accounts(), and get_ip_summary() functions. Uses cache.client.get_client() to access raw Redis client for sorted set operations (zadd, zcard, zrangebyscore, zremrangebyscore). Stores event details in Redis hashes with automatic expiry.
